/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is filled with cars and bicycles, indicating a busy traffic flow. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. Power lines crisscross above the street, a common sight in urban landscapes. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of concrete structures and natural elements in the cityscape.
